Reviews.Title: EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For over twenty years I have wanted an SLR.  This package, after pricing nearly everything, was a find.  I though too good to be true.  And it is... AMAZING...everything in one box, ready to go and easy to use.  I cannot believe my  luck.  I am so much of a novis I bought the Nikon for Dummies book.  This deal is fantasic and it arrive right on schedule.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Yeager
Reviews.Content: Used the camera on vacation, took some breathtaking pictures without any instruction.  This camera is absolutely the best. I cannot wait to use camera for my son's sporting events

Reviews.Title: Beautiful camera!
Reviews.Author: sheena schultz
Reviews.Content: It came way earlier than I thought it was going to and it is way more beautiful than I expected! Everything that came with it including the tripod are such great quality

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Tim2009
Reviews.Content: The Camera is very nice, only reason why I did not give it 5 stars is that you need to have about 1 month to read and watch videos about this, there is so much you can do with it witch is a plus but they need to make it easier for an average joe and work with it...
